


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->
<!-- @name    scrollTop -->

# ```js scrollTop ```


Return the amount of scroll top that the user as made in the page



## Example (js)

```js
import scrollTop from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/scrollTop';
scrollTop();
```
